name: InReCo Modular Slot
desc: Hidden Hullmod that allows InReCo ships to mount their modular hullmods
short: Hidden Hullmod that allows InReCo ships to mount their modular hullmods

name: InReCo Greg Slot
desc: Hidden Hullmod that allows InReCo ships to swap greg drone types
short: Hidden Hullmod that allows InReCo ships to swap greg drone types

name: Concussion Resonance Vanes
desc: Concussion Pulses and boosted active vent rate
short: Concussion Pulses and boosted active vent rate

name: Quick Cycle Capacitors
desc: This vessel features special rapid charging capacitors that increase energy weapon Rate of Fire by %s and reduce the flux cost to fire energy weapons by %s.
short: Plus EN Wep RoF, Minus EN wep flux cost.

name: Flux Rebalancer
desc: Shield res + EN wep Flux, fancy.
short: Shield res + EN wep Flux, fancy.

name: Parasite Drones
desc: ONE OFF DRONE SPAM LET'S GO!
short: ONE OFF DRONE SPAM LET'S GO!

name: Bolt Focus Regulator
sModDesc: Increases the range increase of all non-beam Energy and Hybrid weapons by %s and increases the maximum to %s/%s/%s/%s.
